name: quest
description: «Quest for atlantis» is a tiny ERP for humble businesses. It's also a demo project for aoc-dev, «The aoc framework».
author: https://atlantisofcode.com

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run --prefix quest-client dev" "npm run --prefix quest-server dev"
scripts.update:all: npm update --fund=false && npm update --fund=false --prefix quest-client && npm update --fund=false --prefix quest-server
